articles.title: SpaceX launches Sirius XM radio satellite to orbit, lands rocket on ship at sea (photos)
articles.description: SpaceX launched the SXM-10 satellite for SiriusXM early Saturday morning (June 7), adding another spacecraft to the company's broadcasting constellation.
articles.content:
A SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket launches the SXM-10 satellite for SiriusXM from Florida on June 7, 2025.

articles.title: Alzheimer’s blood test can spot people with early symptoms, study suggests
articles.description: New test accurately picks up on memory problems by examining two proteins in blood plasma, US researchers find
articles.content:
A new blood test for Alzheimer’s disease can accurately detect people with early symptoms, research suggests.

articles.title: Resident Evil Requiem officially arriving next year: Launch date, new characters, storyline and more
articles.description: Resident Evil Requiem, the ninth installment in the franchise, will launch on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox on February 27, 2026. Set in Raccoon City, it promises spine-chilling realism and an immersive experience with rich characters and pulse-pounding action.
articles.content:
Resident Evil Requiem, the ninth installment in the single-player survival horror game franchise, was unveiled at Summer Game Fest 2025. The new game will be released across PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox on 27 February, 2026.

articles.title: Russia launches biggest drone attack on Ukraine's Kharkiv
articles.description: At least three people are killed and 17 injured in Kharkiv, near the Russian border.
articles.content:
At least three people have been killed and another 17 injured in the biggest Russian drone attack on Ukraine's second-largest city of Kharkiv, the mayor says.
